title: How to Use IsoMemo for Researchers
text: distribution variable “d15N” isotope?  Let’s see linear relationship variables d13C d15N:
code: getDatabaseList() # tells what database are currently published #> [1] "14CSea"   "CIMA"     "IntChron" "LiVES"  df1 = getData('LiVES') summary(df1) #>    source          id            description             d13C        #>  LiVES:3664   Length:3664        Length:3664        Min.   :-25.00   #>               Class :character   Class :character   1st Qu.:-20.65   #>               Mode  :character   Mode  :character   Median :-19.89   #>                                                     Mean   :-19.66   #>                                                     3rd Qu.:-19.10   #>                                                     Max.   :-10.27   #>                                                     NA's   :60       #>       d15N          latitude       longitude           site           #>  Min.   : 4.38   Min.   :32.36   Min.   :-10.439   Length:3664        #>  1st Qu.: 8.60   1st Qu.:40.42   1st Qu.:  7.506   Class :character   #>  Median : 9.70   Median :48.57   Median : 13.847   Mode  :character   #>  Mean   :10.14   Mean   :47.22   Mean   : 14.921                      #>  3rd Qu.:11.20   3rd Qu.:51.87   3rd Qu.: 22.717                      #>  Max.   :18.31   Max.   :68.09   Max.   : 84.050                      #>  NA's   :721                                                          #>     dateMean        dateLower        dateUpper     dateUncertainty   #>  Min.   :   686   Min.   :   758   Min.   :  352   Min.   :  -17.5   #>  1st Qu.:  3150   1st Qu.:  2559   1st Qu.: 2065   1st Qu.:   49.0   #>  Median :  4495   Median :  3970   Median : 3520   Median :   80.0   #>  Mean   :  4970   Mean   :  4761   Mean   : 4224   Mean   :  125.5   #>  3rd Qu.:  5421   3rd Qu.:  5360   3rd Qu.: 5000   3rd Qu.:  125.0   #>  Max.   :105000   Max.   :130000   Max.   :80000   Max.   :12500.0   #>  NA's   :7        NA's   :7        NA's   :7       NA's   :273       #>        datingType   #>  expert     :2225   #>  radiocarbon:1439   #>                     #>                     #>                     #>                     #> hist(df1$d15N) df1 <- na.omit(df1) lm(d13C~d15N,data=df1) #>  #> Call: #> lm(formula = d13C ~ d15N, data = df1) #>  #> Coefficients: #> (Intercept)         d15N   #>    -21.8468       0.2195

title: Authors and Citation
text: Jan Abel. Maintainer. Jianyin Roachell. Author. Andreas Neudecker. Author. Antonia Runge. Author. Ricardo Fernandes. Author.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Roachell J, Neudecker , Runge , Fernandes R (2024). IsoMemo: Retrieve Data using 'IsoMemo' API. R package version 23.11.0, https://pandora-isomemo.github.io/isomemo-data/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {IsoMemo: Retrieve Data using the 'IsoMemo' API},   author = {Jianyin Roachell and Andreas Neudecker and Antonia Runge and Ricardo Fernandes},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 23.11.0},   url = {https://pandora-isomemo.github.io/isomemo-data/}, }

what: Retrieve Data using the IsoMemo API
title: Retrieve Data using the IsoMemo API
text: IsoMemo Big Data initiative bringing together isotopic data archaeology, ecology, environmental & life sciences. Isotopic tracers used across variety research fields provide rich diversity scientific information, lack centralized storage limits efficient data use. IsoMemo initiative brings together independent repositories isotopic data within fields archaeology, ecology, environmental & life sciences. goals initiative make isotopic data easily findable accessible can easily reused research purposes. IsoMemo also promotes creation data standards interoperability types. Within IsoMemo independent database self-manages curates data defines metadata requirements. However, initiative also promotes creation networks linking different databases. R package retrieve data Max-Planck-Institute (MPI) IsoMemo Web-application API publish CRAN public download. information access IsoMemo Apps: https://isomemoapp.com/ Isomemo Project Director: Dr. Ricardo Fernandes: fernandes@shh.mpg.de Max Planck Institute Science Human History. School Archaeology (University Oxford) Developer: INWT Statistics GmbH API developer: Andreas Neudecker, INWT andreas.neudecker@inwt-statistics.de Maintainer: Jan Abel, INWT abel.jan@inwt-statistics.de

title: Retrieve Data using the IsoMemo API
text: can install released version IsoMemo CRAN : development version GitHub :
code: install.packages("IsoMemo") #> Installiere Paket nach '/home/ljabel/R/x86_64-pc-linux-gnu-library/4.3' #> (da 'lib' nicht spezifiziert) options(repos = c(getOption("repos"), PANDORA = "https://Pandora-IsoMemo.github.io/drat/")) install.packages("IsoMemo") #> Installiere Paket nach '/home/ljabel/R/x86_64-pc-linux-gnu-library/4.3' #> (da 'lib' nicht spezifiziert)

what: Example of how to use the package:
title: Retrieve Data using the IsoMemo API
code: options(repos = c(getOption("repos"), PANDORA = "https://Pandora-IsoMemo.github.io/drat/")) install.packages("IsoMemo") #> Installiere Paket nach '/home/ljabel/R/x86_64-pc-linux-gnu-library/4.3' #> (da 'lib' nicht spezifiziert)  library(IsoMemo) ## basic example code df = getData(db="LiVES") head(df) #>   source   id                        description  d13C d15N latitude longitude #> 1  LiVES 1000 Ajdovska Jama 21 , S Neo (Lengyel) -20.4  9.0  45.9667   15.4833 #> 2  LiVES 1001  Ajdovska Jama 3 , S Neo (Lengyel) -20.6  8.1  45.9667   15.4833 #> 3  LiVES 1002  Ajdovska Jama 6 , S Neo (Lengyel) -20.8  9.0  45.9667   15.4833 #> 4  LiVES 1003  Ajdovska Jama 7 , S Neo (Lengyel) -20.3  8.1  45.9667   15.4833 #> 5  LiVES 1004    Ajdovska Jama , S Neo (Lengyel) -22.4  5.8  45.9667   15.4833 #> 6  LiVES 1005    Ajdovska Jama , S Neo (Lengyel) -21.0  6.6  45.9667   15.4833 #>            site dateMean dateLower dateUpper dateUncertainty  datingType #> 1 Ajdovska Jama     5365      4328      4055              31 radiocarbon #> 2 Ajdovska Jama     5421      4340      4235              30 radiocarbon #> 3 Ajdovska Jama     5436      4344      4244              30 radiocarbon #> 4 Ajdovska Jama     5485      4448      4243              50 radiocarbon #> 5 Ajdovska Jama     4250      4450      4050             100      expert #> 6 Ajdovska Jama     4250      4450      4050             100      expert  # with category argument df = getData(db="LiVES",category = "Location") head(df) #>   latitude longitude          site #> 1  45.9667   15.4833 Ajdovska Jama #> 2  45.9667   15.4833 Ajdovska Jama #> 3  45.9667   15.4833 Ajdovska Jama #> 4  45.9667   15.4833 Ajdovska Jama #> 5  45.9667   15.4833 Ajdovska Jama #> 6  45.9667   15.4833 Ajdovska Jama  # with field argument df = getData(db="LiVES",category = "Location",field= "latitude") head(df) #>   latitude #> 1  45.9667 #> 2  45.9667 #> 3  45.9667 #> 4  45.9667 #> 5  45.9667 #> 6  45.9667

title: Call API — callAPI
text: Call API

title: Call API — callAPI
text: action (character) name endpoint, one "mapping-ids", "dbsources", "iso-data" "mapping" ... parameters endpoint, e.g. mappingId = "IsoMemo", dbsource = "LiVES, field = "site,longitude", ...

what: API wrapper that fetches data from IsoMemo Applications — getData
title: API wrapper that fetches data from IsoMemo Applications — getData
text: Data retrieval databases within IsoMemo initiative (https://isomemo.com/). Given parameters Database name, category names, field names.

title: API wrapper that fetches data from IsoMemo Applications — getData
code: getData(   db = getDatabaseList(mapping = "IsoMemo"),   category = NULL,   field = NULL,   mapping = "IsoMemo" )

title: API wrapper that fetches data from IsoMemo Applications — getData
text: db (character) database options:  "14CSea"   "CIMA"     "IntChron" "LiVES" category (character) domain specific categories fields retrieve: "Dating info","Isotopic proxies." set NULL (default) categories returned field (character) fields return. set NULL (default) fields returned mapping (character) Optionally, provide specific mapping order obtain list databases mapping. Check available mapping ids getMappings()

title: API wrapper that fetches data from IsoMemo Applications — getData
text: data frame containing requested databases, category domains, variables interest user

title: Get Database List — getDatabaseList
text: Get Database List

title: Get Database List — getDatabaseList
text: mapping (character) Optionally, provide specific mapping order obtain list databases mapping. Check available mapping ids getMappings()

title: Get Database List — getDatabaseList
text: character vector available databases

title: Get field mapping table — getFields
text: Get field mapping table

title: Get field mapping table — getFields
text: mapping (character) Optionally, provide specific mapping order obtain list databases mapping. Check available mapping ids getMappings() colnamesAPI (logical) Optionally, return dataframe column names come 'IsoMemo' API

title: Get field mapping table — getFields
text: data frame describes data field name, data type, domain category

title: Get Mappings — getMappings
text: Get available mapping ids

title: Get Mappings — getMappings
text: character vector available mapping ids

text: optional parameter getFields() receive column names come ‘IsoMemo’ API

title: IsoMemo 23.10.1
text: fix missing column name getFields()

title: IsoMemo 23.10.0
text: main function getData() got new optional parameter mapping change mapping applied combination data sources can retrieved using ‘IsoMemo’ API. Currently ‘IsoMemo’ API understands one mapping called “IsoMemo”. mappings combine different sources data, added future. Switch SemVer CalVer

title: IsoMemo 1.0.6
text: CRAN release: 2022-06-16

what: Corrections with name changes and corrections:
title: IsoMemo 1.0.6
text: Name changes: says “Retrieve Data using Max Plank Institute ‘IsoMemo’ API” change : “Retrieve Data using ‘IsoMemo’ API”. pdf title webpage. says”database options: “14CSea” , “IntChron” , “IsoArcH” , “LiVES” change “examples database options:”14CSea” , “IntChron” , “CIMA” , “LiVES” says “Data retrieval IsoMemo App Project https://isomemoapp.com/ Given parameters Database name, category names, field names.” changed “Data retrieval databases within IsoMemo initiative (https://isomemo.com/). Given parameters Database name, category names, field names.”

title: IsoMemo 1.0.5
text: CRAN release: 2022-06-03

title: IsoMemo 1.0.5
text: main function facilitate data retrieval aggregation API : getData() following sub-functions contained package: - getRemoteDataAPI() retrieves API query data - getMappingAPI() calls mapping fields needed user API calls - getDatabaseList() returns list database names linked API call - callAPI() initiates request call
